extension.name: sh404sef - Offline code plugin
extension.author: Yannick Gaultier
extension.description: Render Joomla's offline page with the appropriate http response code

field.name: disallowAdminAccess
field.label: Disallow admin access while offline
field.description: If set to Yes, access to frontend will also be disabled for administrators of the site (while Joomla default offline screen allows administrators to login)

field.name: retry_after_delay
field.label: Delay for Retry-after header
field.description: Delay in seconds to be set as a header, to tell search engines when then should try come back and revisit the site
